header.title: Domains
header.description: Add a domain to enhance security and streamline login by directing users to your identity provider based on their email domain.

table.empty_message: You do not have any domains.

notifications.general_error: There was an issue processing your request. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
notifications.fetch_providers_error: There was an issue fetching providers. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
notifications.fetch_domains_error: There was an issue fetching domains. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

domain_create.error: There was an issue creating the domain.

domain_verify.error: There was an issue verifying the domain.
domain_verify.on_before: Domain verify validation is not correct.
domain_verify.verification_failed: ${domainName} could not be verified. Please wait and try again or check with your DNS provider.

domain_delete.error: There was an issue deleting the domain.

domain_associate_provider.error: There was an issue associating the domain to the provider.
domain_associate_provider.on_before: Domain associate to provider validation is not correct.

domain_delete_provider.error: There was an issue removing the domain from the provider.
domain_delete_provider.on_before: Domain delete from provider validation is not correct.

modal.title: Configure ${domain}
modal.description: Direct users with an ${domain} email domain to your identity provider for authentication for the selected providers.

table.empty_message: You do not have any providers.

description.pending: ${domainName} is pending verification and may take up to 48 hours to process. Are you sure you want to delete this domain?
description.verified: Deleting ${domainName} may disrupt login flows for users. Are you sure you want to delete this domain? This action cannot be undone.

verification_status.label: Verification Status:
verification_status.description: Your domain is pending verification. Click 'Verify' to refresh the status, or check back later. DNS changes may take up to 48 hours, but typically process faster.

errors.verification_failed: ${domainName} could not be verified. Please wait and try again or check with your DNS provider.

name.label: Name
name.helper_text: A human-readable identifier for the organization, used by end users to direct them to their organization in your application.
name.error: Please enter a valid organization name

display_name.label: Display Name
display_name.helper_text: The name displayed to end users of this organization.
display_name.error: Please enter a valid display name

logo.label: Organization Logo
logo.helper_text: The logo that will be displayed to end-users for this organization in any interaction with them.
logo.error: Please enter a valid HTTPS URL for the logo

primary_color.label: Primary Color
primary_color.helper_text: The primary color for buttons displayed to end users of this organization in your application's authentication flows.
primary_color.error: Please enter a valid color format

page_background_color.label: Page Background Color
page_background_color.helper_text: The page background color displayed to end users of this organization in your application's authentication flows.
page_background_color.error: Please enter a valid color format

org_delete.title: Delete ${orgName}
org_delete.description: Once confirmed, this operation cannot be undone.
org_delete.modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete ${orgName}? Users will be maintained but membership to this organization will be removed. Once confirmed, this action cannot be undone.

org_details_edit.save_org_changes_message: The changes have been saved for ${orgName}.
org_details_edit.org_changes_error_message: There was an issue processing your request. ${message}.
org_details_edit.org_changes_error_message_generic: There was an issue processing your request. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

header.title: Single Sign-On
header.description: Set up and manage SSO access for your organization.

table.empty_message: You do not have any providers.

create_consent_modal.title: Before creating the provider, please note:
create_consent_modal.description: Creating this provider will enable SSO access to ${organizationName}. To prioritize security, assign access and test the provider as soon as possible once the provider is active.

notifications.general_error: There was an issue processing your request. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.
notifications.provider_create_duplicated_provider_erro: ${providerName} provider already exists. Please choose a different name.

provider_select.title: Select Your Identity Provider
provider_select.description: Choose the identity provider you plan to integrate with Auth0 to access step-by-step configuration instructions.

provider_details.title: Provider Details
provider_details.description: Provide a recognizable name and a permanent identifier to help you manage and reference this provider later.

name.label: Name
name.helper_text: A human-readable identifier for the provider. This cannot be changed.
name.error: Please enter a valid organization name

display_name.label: Display Name
display_name.helper_text: The name displayed to end users of this provider.
display_name.error: Please enter a valid display name

provider_configure.title: Configure Provider
provider_configure.description: Establish a connection between your identity provider and Auth0.

show_as_button.label: Show as button
show_as_button.helper_text: Display this connection as a button on the login page

assign_membership_on_login.label: Assign membership on login
assign_membership_on_login.helper_text: Automatically grant organization membership to users who log in through this connection

type.label: Communication Channel
type.helper_text: Select whether authentication exchanges occur via server-to-server communication (Back Channel) or through the browser using Implicit Flow with Form Post (Front Channel).

cert.label: Signing Certificate
cert.helper_text: SAML X.509 public key encoded in PEM or CER format.
cert.error: Please upload a valid signing certificate

sign_request.label: Sign Request
sign_request.helper_text_metadata_file: When enabled, the SAML authentication request will be signed. Download the <link>certificate</link> and provide it to the SAMLP that will receive the signed assertion to validate the signature. This needs to be enabled first in the SAMLP. Once enabled, share the metadata URL for integration.
sign_request.helper_text_metadata_url: When enabled, the SAML authentication request will be signed. Download the <link>certificate</link> and provide it to the SAMLP that will receive the signed assertion to validate the signature.

request_protocol_binding.label: Request Protocol Binding
request_protocol_binding.helper_text: The SAML protocol binding to use for authentication requests.

sign_request_algorithm.label: Sign Request Algorithm
sign_request_algorithm.helper_text: The algorithm used to sign SAML authentication requests.

sign_request_algorithm_digest.label: Sign Request Algorithm Digest
sign_request_algorithm_digest.helper_text: The digest algorithm used for SAML request signing.

icon_url.label: Icon URL
icon_url.helper_text: URL for the provider icon displayed to users.

meta_data_url.label: Metadata URL
meta_data_url.helper_text: Location to retrieve WS-Fed SSO connection information for integration.
meta_data_url.error: Please enter a valid metadata URL

meta_data_location_url.label: Metadata Location URL
meta_data_location_url.helper_text: Location to retrieve WS-Fed SSO connection information for integration.
meta_data_location_url.error: Please enter a valid metadata location URL

federation_metadata_file.label: Federation Metadata File
federation_metadata_file.helper_text: Digital credential used for secure identity authentication.
federation_metadata_file.error: Please upload a valid federation metadata file

ping_federate_baseurl.label: Single Sign-On Login URL
ping_federate_baseurl.helper_text: Endpoint for initiating secure authentication in PingFederate SSO connections.
ping_federate_baseurl.error: Please enter a valid SSO login URL

sign_cert.label: Signing Certificate
sign_cert.helper_text: Digital credential used for secure identity authentication.
sign_cert.error: Please upload a valid signing certificate

sign_request.label: Sign Request
sign_request.helper_text: When enabled, the SAML authentication request will be signed. Download the <link>certificate</link> and provide it to the SAMLP that will receive the signed assertion to validate the signature. This needs to be enabled first in the SAMLP. Once enabled, share the metadata URL for integration.

sign_request_algorithm.label: Sign Request Algorithm
sign_request_algorithm.helper_text: The algorithm used to sign SAML authentication requests to PingFederate.

sign_request_algorithm_digest.label: Sign Request Algorithm Digest
sign_request_algorithm_digest.helper_text: The digest algorithm used for PingFederate request signing.

alert.warning: User attribute mappings for single sign-on have been updated. Please review the attributes and update your identity provider configuration to avoid login issues.

header.title: Provisioning
header.description: Set up provisioning to allow user profile syncing to your organization.

warning_alert_message.title: Mappings for provisioning have been updated.
warning_alert_message.description: Please review the attributes and update your identity provider configuration to ensure proper provisioning.

content.description: Are you sure you want to disable provisioning? This will permanently delete the provisioning configuration and revoke access for any clients using provisioning with this provider.

manage_tokens.title: Bearer Tokens
manage_tokens.description: Generate a bearer token to provide your identity provider. You can create up to two tokens.

empty_state.title: No tokens created yet
empty_state.description: Generate a bearer token to authenticate SCIM requests from your identity provider.

content.description: Copy the bearer token to provide your identity provider. It will not be displayed again upon closing this dialog.

content.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete token ${tokenId}? This action cannot be undone.
content.description: To avoid downtime, consider creating a second token and supplying it to your provisioning client before deleting this one.

user_id_attribute.label: User ID Attribute
user_id_attribute.helper_text: The attribute that uniquely identifies a user.

mappings.title: Mapping
mappings.description: Ensure that the correct user attributes are passed from the identity provider to the service provider.

card.title: Required Attributes
card.description: Ensure that a valid ${strategy} attribute is mapped to the following attributes.

modal.description: Users who sign in through this provider will lose access. The action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

content.description: Type in the name of the provider to confirm.

remove_sso_provider.title: Remove this provider from the organization
remove_sso_provider.description: Once confirmed, this operation cannot be undone.

modal.title: Remove ${providerName} from ${organizationName}
modal.description: This will revoke access to ${providerName} for all users in this organization. Users will not be deleted but will no longer be able to sign in using this provider

mfa.description: Extra protection for your account and your identity
mfa.component_error_description:
We're having trouble loading your multi-factor authentication methods.
Please refresh the page and try again
mfa.delete_mfa_phone_consent: Are you sure you want to remove this Phone number for SMS?
mfa.delete_mfa_email_consent: Are you sure you want to remove this Email?
mfa.delete_mfa_totp_consent: Are you sure you want to remove this authenticator?
mfa.delete_mfa_push-notification_consent: Are you sure you want to remove this push notification?
mfa.delete_mfa_recovery-code_consent: Are you sure you want to remove this recovery code?

errors.phone_number_required: Phone number is required for SMS enrollment.
errors.email_required: Email is required for Email enrollment.

push-notification.too_many_entities: You reached the limit of entities of the push notification type for this user.
push-notification.unsupported_challenge_type: Auth0 Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "Push notifications" on Guardian MFA section.
push-notification.authorization_pending: Authorization pending: please repeat the request in a few seconds.

totp.too_many_entities: You reached the limit of entities of the totp type for this user.
totp.unsupported_challenge_type: OTP Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "Push notifications" on Guardian MFA section (Push notications include OTP).

phone.unsupported_challenge_type: SMS Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "SMS" on Guardian MFA section.
phone.too_many_entities: You reached the limit of entities of the sms type for this user.

email.access_denied: Could not find the requested authenticator
email.too_many_entities: You reached the limit of entities of the email type for this user.

phone.title: Phone Message
phone.description: No phone number has been added.

push-notification.title: Push Notification using Auth0 Guardian
push-notification.description: No push authentication has been added.

duo.title: Duo Security
duo.description: Use your DUO account for Multi-factor Authentication.

webauthn-roaming.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Security Keys
webauthn-roaming.description: Use WebAuthn-compliant security keys (e.g., FIDO2) as a second factor.
webauthn-roaming.button-text: Add WebAuthn with FIDO Security Keys

webauthn-platform.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Device Biometrics
webauthn-platform.description: Use WebAuthn-compliant device biometrics as a second factor.
webauthn-platform.button-text: Add WebAuthn with FIDO Device Biometrics

recovery-code.title: Recovery Code
recovery-code.description: Use a unique recovery code to regain account access.

enrollment_form.enroll_email_description: Enter your email to receive a verification code
enrollment_form.enroll_sms_description: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code
enrollment_form.show_auth0_guardian_title: Scan this QR code with your Auth0 Guardian App to register this Authentication method or copy the url.
enrollment_form.recovery_code_description: Copy this recovery code and keep it somewhere safe. You'll need it if you ever need to log in without your device.

show_otp.title: Scan this QR code with your Authenticator App to register this Authentication method or copy the code.
show_otp.enter_code: Enter the code from your authenticator app
show_otp.enter_verify_code: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to ${verifier}
show_otp.enter_opt_code: Enter the code from your authenticator
show_otp.install_guardian_description: In order to continue, install the Auth0 Guardian app via the app store from your mobile device
